trans-unit.source: Sets the synchronization value of the component.
Both transaction and just-in-time (JIT) activation enable synchronization automatically.
trans-unit.target: 事务和在实时 (JIT) 激活将自动启用同步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Applying <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute> to a context-bound object results in the creation of a wait handle and auto reset event, which are not deterministically garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute>到上下文绑定对象会导致创建等待句柄和自动重置事件，这是不确定地垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not create a large number of context-bound objects marked with the `SynchronizationAttribute` within a short time period.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不应创建大量的绑定上下文的对象标记为`SynchronizationAttribute`在短时间段内。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute> type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute>类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute" /> class with the default <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute.Value%2A> property is set to the default value <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption.Required>.
The following code example creates a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个新<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个新<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current setting of the <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute.Value" /> 属性的当前设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the value of a `Synchronization` attribute's <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取的值`Synchronization`特性的<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationAttribute.Value%2A>属性。
